version_description:
BIG UPDATE

- "Earthquakes" section
Now you can see the earthquakes in the world

- Apple Watch extension
Now you can enable/disable the alarms and adjust some settings

- Minor bug fixing

Thank you for your support and suggestions!
We encourage you to send us corrections of your translation.

- Now you can activate the alarm just put your phone in horizontal on table
- New e-mail alarm
- New feed from EMSC.eu
- Auto update earthquakes list
- Notifications new earthquakes
- New levels (alarm & sesitivity) for more precision
- 12 audio alarms
- Fullscreen seismograph in landscape with GPS info (you can disable it on options)
- On/Off from siren icon
- Notifications with more information

NOTE: This is the last version for iOS 7.0 (iPhone4)
